header: God Establishes His Covenant with David(A)

verse: After David had settled down to live in his palace, he spoke with the prophet Nathan. “Look, here I am living in this cedar palace, but the ark of the Lord’s covenant remains surrounded by curtains!”
“Do everything you have in mind,” Nathan replied to David, “because God is with you.”
